Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits the provision of assistance in any manner to federal authorities in the enforcement of the US Executive Orders of January 27, 2017 and March 6, 2017, relating to foreign terrorist entry
Summary: Prohibits the provision of assistance by port authority personnel, in any manner, to federal authorities in the enforcement of the US Executive Orders of January 27, 2017 and March 6, 2017, relating to foreign terrorist entry.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 802 of the laws of 1947, relating to facilitating the financing and effectuation of air terminals by the Port of New York Authority, in relation to prohibiting the provision of assistance in the enforcement of certain United States Executive Orders relating to protecting the nation from foreign terrorist entry, at the facilities of such port authority
